turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Theriyama Unna Kadhalichitten.
turn.2: Theriyama Unna Kadhalichitten Theriyama Unna Kadhalichitten is a 2014 Indian Tamil film written and directed by Ramu.
turn.4: The film features Vijay Vasanth and Resna Pavithran in the lead roles, and was released in October 2014.
turn.6: The film marked the first production venture of V Vinoth Kumar and he chose to name his studio as Triple V Productions after his father entrepreneur H. Vasanthakumar, his brother actor Vijay Vasanth and himself.
turn.8: He was impressed by a script written by K. Ramu, who waited a few years to narrate the film to a producer, having previously directed television serials and apprenticed under Priyadarshan.
turn.9: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.10: The film's soundtrack was launched in July 2013 with several of Vijay Vasanth's co-stars from "Chennai 600028" (2007) in attendance.
turn.12: The film had a delayed release, and was stuck for close to a year after production had finished.
